answers.answer: I'm not trying to be gross but what position does the pain accrue in
Any position. ....i dont know if its his sperm or what 0_o
It's not his sperm how far along r u
Maybe make sure he doesn't ejaculate in u. His sperm can cause contractions. You might want to ask ur Dr if it is safe for you to have sex since this happens.
Ur belly is probably just stretching and it's not use to having a baby in there I'd talk to ur obgyn when u go next
Ok....my appt. Is on the 26th for my first ultrasound,  and i will talk to her.....thank you!
Ur welcome and take it easy
Is it okay to continue metformin. I am in 6 weeks preg
Have you talked to ur ob about being on that medication
Im not on any medcation yet.....i havent even had my first Dr. Appt yet....its on Jan. 26 th
I was talking to turning metformin is used for people with blood sugar problems

Oh ok.....that has to be hard. I mean geesh you already pregnant on top of blood sugar problems. Poor hunny, this will be my second child and only thing i have thats been a problem is my Negative blood type. Its treats babies like a forn object and mybody and detroys it, so i have to get a special shot that will alow me to carry fullterm. Or i would miscarry everytime.

I had to stop metformin the second I found out I was pregnant. I don't have diabetes, just insulin resistance. And I didn't develop gestational diabetes either. But I do keep randomly testing my blood sugar levels and watch out what I eat.

question: So i havent been able to have sex with my husband because after everytime we do i start cramping so bad and it will last for days? The pain be so bad sosomet, it bring me to my knees what can i do? Gratefully my husband is understanding, but at the same times it is very frustrating for him.......any suggestions??
title: Sex when your pregnant?
